EmailTemplate.name: EmailOnQualifiedFab9/10Account
EmailTemplate.subject: Fab9/10 Account Qualified
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Greg,
Just to bring to your knowledge that the following Fab9/10 Account {!Account.Name} is Qualified.
Please login to Salesforce to verify the details of the account.
Thanks.
NOTE: This is a system generated message. Please do not reply this email
